issuerLockTokenResponse.title: LockTokenResponse response with hash of lock

total.title:
total number of registered tokens, if the issued_id is passed, only
its tokens are taken into account

replicatorGetTokenListResponse.title: GetTokenListResponse — list of tokens with additional info

id.title:
id — value is explicetely used by Replicator to uniquely identify related
issuer later in order to ban him (discredite case), since
"identity_pubkey", "host" may be changed

identity_pubkey.description:
identity_pubkey — the following field values are used to open payment
channel, invoices commands execution etc.

host.title:
host is used to establish client connection to the issuer's node during
some RPC calls

limit.title: limit – maximum on the one page

offset.title: offset from the beginning of the list

replicatorPagination.title: Pagination used for separation on page

root.title: root — hash of last block in blockchain

replicatorToken.title: Token contain information about token to send it and store in DB

issuer_info.title:
issuer_info — contain info about token about the issuer server that 
issued the token

valid_until_seconds.title:
valid_until_seconds — protects issuers from such a case, when potential
buyer successfully acquires dozens of signatures just in case if that 
issuer would raise up the price later. If a Token Wallet holder would
like to open channel with an outdated offer, Replicator would reject to
register this purchase and buyer stays unprotected

count.title: count — the number of tokens to be issued

replicatorTokenOffer.title:
TokenOffer is used to send an offer to buy a token
TODO: rework or remove

expiration.title: expiration — number of PKT block after which the token expires

creation.title: creation — date of token creation in unix time format

issuer_pubkey.title: issuer_pubkey — public key of issuer used for signing

urls.title: urls — set of urls for access to blockchain
